entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow at times. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
